gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Class LinearGradient

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.graphics.Gradient
      gwt.g2d.client.graphics.LinearGradient

public class LinearGradient
extends Gradient

Represents a linear gradient that paints along the line given by the coordinates.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Constructor Summary
LinearGradient(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
          Creates a linear gradient from (x0, y0) to (x1, y1).
LinearGradient(Vector2 startPoint, Vector2 endPoint)
          Creates a linear gradient from startPoint to endPoint.
